item.title: Orange Fairness - Reweighing a Dataset
item.description: In the previous blog post, we introduced the Orange fairness addon along with the Dataset Bias and As Fairness widgets. We also demonstrated how to use them to detect bias in a dataset and visualized the results for a better understanding. In this blog, we will introduce the Reweighing widget, which we can use to mitigate bias in a dataset, resulting in fairer machine learning models learning from it. Reweighing: The Reweighing widget offers a solution to mitigate bias in datasets by assigning weights to individual instances.
